@ ...You don't know the difference between work and home. No company should owe you any such thing. Places to pump and fridges to store your milk...yes, right! LMAO! Go buy a cooler or better yet, pump at home or on YOUR time and get the hell over yourselves or stay the hell home altogether and take care of your crap. Work is work and not a place to take care of this kind of nonsense. You and people just like you are ruining this country with your idiotic demands and entitled attitudes.

Most people have no idea about the """"School of the Americas"""", the """"Chicago boys"""" or any of the atrocities that have been occurring in America's back yard since the 80's. I hope this is the beginning of major changes throughout South America!

No religion on Earth has ever been progressive, nor has there been any scientific influence that helped improving human lives by adding any technologic value to World civilization except, their self-righteous doctrines, and social and moral rules. It was ancient Greek and Egypt, 5000 - 1000 BC, long before Islam, which provided the first blueprints of engineering for modern civilization, and the apparatus that helped men to build temples, cities, roads, and aqua docks. So, Al Jazeera, check your schooling again.

Trump says and does anything to get attention. Anyone who studies this guy knows that this was his plan years ago and he even talked about how to dominate the media. So he is constantly in the news and the other candidates are forced to talk about him a lot...so it sucks the air out of their ability to get a reasonable share of airtime....and when they do get it often they are on the defense. It is absolutely brilliant strategy...his actual reality TV experience preped him nicely for this. Only this time it is NOT reality TV...it is the Presidency of the US...not a game...not """"Your Fired""""...or who gets """"Kicked off the Island"""".
You missed this one!
Forbid these games for kids.
Bullshit

I'm sorry you had to deal with stupid security officers and store owners... ; however, maybe that Asian salon owner wasn't being racist but rather did not have the education to cut coarser hair and was knowledgeable enough to know where her skills lacked ability. I've had terrible haircuts because the stylist didn't have the knowledge to cut my funky asian hair and didn't inform me of that. Unfortunately not all salon schools or hair stylists learn to cut all types of hair. If she was being racist I'm sorry. Personally i wouldn't want to support her business because either she's racist or needs more training.
What choice???
